/# login setup
1. bash
2. source ~/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh
3. conda activate pytorch

/# train a model
1. cd abnormalBDL
2. python train.py --[with options]
[e.g. python train.py --n_MC_Gen 3 --n_MC_Disc 3 ...

/# open the visdom server(so you can see the training process(loss, reconstructed image) locally)
1. python -m visdom.server
2. bind the server port to local port by running the the following command(in local!!!)
sshpass -p "PASSWORD" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -X -N -f -L localhost:8097:localhost:8097  [TUFTS_EECS_USERNAME]@aws-gpu-2.eecs.tufts.edu
3. access localhost:8097 in local browser
